Azmarxides, the Pyrodoom ESC
BR 3BR 5 Legendary Creature - God Creature 2/2
2 If a source you control would deal an amount of noncombat damage less than Azmarxides’s power to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage instead. Whenever a source you control deals noncombat damage to a permanent or player, put a +1/+1 counter on Azmarxides.
Smitepaw, Emperor of Cats ESC
WRG RGW 3 Legendary Creature - Cat Noble Creature 1/5
2 You may look at the top card of your library at any time. If you’ve gained life this turn, you may cast Cat spells from the top of your library. Other Cats you control get +1/+1.
Gingerides, Gingerfolk King ESC
WUBG 2GWUB 6 Legendary Artifact Creature - Food Noble Creature 3/6
2 Foods you control have “{T}: Add {C}.” and “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.” Sacrifice thirteen tokens: Put Gingerides, Gingerfolk King onto the battlefield from the command zone. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Gingerides, Gingerfolk King: You gain 3 life.
Afilthycasual108, Multiplicative Inferno ESC
BR 1BR 3 Legendary Creature - Pheonix Soldier Horror Creature 2/2
2 Flying Phoenix spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Activated abilities of Phoenix cards in your graveyard cost {1} less to activate. Whenever a Phoenix you control enters from your graveyard, create a token that’s a copy of it.
LucarioKid, Crystal Mathematician ESC
WBG WBG 3 Legendary Creature - Dragon Wizard Creature 1/3
2 Flying Whenever you gain life, choose one — • Draw a card. You lose 1 life. • Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures. WBG: Create a 1/1 colorless Kobold creature token with lifelink.
BaronVonShroom ESC
BG 2BG 4 Legendary Creature - Fungus Noble Creature 3/3
2 BaronVonShroom has indestructible as long as you control another Fungi. Fungi you control get +1/+1.
THE CLOCK ESC
WUR 1URW 4 Legendary Artifact Creature - Orb Creature 4/4
2 Whenever you cast a spell during an extra turn, additional step, or additional phase, copy that spell. (Copies of permanents become tokens.) Whenever you cast a spell, put an hour counter on THE CLOCK for each of that spell’s colors. If it has twelve or more, remove them and take an extra turn after this one.
Master of the Third Path ESC
WU 1WU 3 Legendary Creature - Human Wizard Creature 0/7
2 Each player may draw an additional card during their draw step. Whenever an opponent chooses to do so, you gain 1 life and scry 1. 1W: You gain life equal to the number of cards in your hand. 1U: Draw a card.
The Archival Orb ESC
WUBRG W/UU/BG/UU/R 4 Legendary Creature - Orb Creature 0/7
2 4W: Create a legendary white artifact token with “At the beginning of each player’s draw step, that player draws an additional card.” 4B: Create a legendary black artifact token with “Whenever an opponent draws a card, they lose 1 life.” 4R: Create a legendary red artifact token with “{7}, Sacrifice this artifact: Each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.” 4G: Create a legendary green artifact token with “Whenever you draw a card, you gain 1 life.”
The Taxmaster ESC
W 3W 4 Legendary Creature - Advisor Creature
2 Whenever an opponent draws a card, they may pay {1}. If they don’t, you may draw a card. Whenever an opponent casts a spell, they may pay {1}. If they don’t, create a treasure token. WUBRG, {T}: Until end of turn, target opponent can’t choose to pay costs of abilities you control if they could choose to not pay those costs.
Aarlin Venticross ESC
UR 3UR 5 Legendary Creature - Bird Soldier Wizard Creature 3/3
2 Flying Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Whenever you cast your fourth spell each turn, copy it.
Maximus The Bloodsworn ESC
BR 3BR 5 Legendary Creature - Elf Soldier Assassin Creature 1/2
2 Haste BR, Pay 2 life: This creature gains double strike until end of turn. Whenever you lose life, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Samuel Sheather ESC
WUR 2URW 5 Legendary Creature - Human Artificer Soldier Creature 2/6
2 Whenever Samuel Sheather attacks, create an artifact equipment token with equip {2} and with one of the following— • Equipped creature gets +1/+2 and gains vigilance. • Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and haste. • Equipped creature gains flying.
Samuel's Workshop ESC
WU 2WU 4 Legendary Enchantment - Saga Enchantment
1
I — Create a treasure token. II — Discover 4. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 4 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.) III — Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile an artifact card with mana value 5 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.
The Archive Project ESC
U 5U 6 Legendary Enchantment Enchantment
1 If you would draw one or more cards, draw that many plus one. During your opponents turns, spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Archibald Theophilus III mark II ESC
UB 2UB 4 Legendary Artifact Creature - Robot Wizard Creature 3/2
2 Flying Whenever Archibald Theophilus III mark II attacks, put -1/-1 on target creature. Whenever you draw your third card each turn, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
Secondary Scythe ESC
UB UB 2 Artifact - Equipment Artifact
1 Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card. Equip legendary {1} Equip {3}
Star Fire Ball ESC
UR 2UR 4 Instant Instant
3 Star Fire Ball deals 2 damage to each creature, then return all damaged creature cards to their owners hands.
